alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 22 at 7:59AM MST until March 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep extra food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
